title: The Chores Challenge
story: He is playing video games. Mom gets mad. She thinks he is lazy. She gives him a list of chores. He frowns. He looks at the list. He has to clean the floors. Then, he has to wash the dishes. Finally, he has to feed the dog. He starts doing his chores.
summary: A boy learns about responsibility when his mom gives him a list of chores to complete.
image: An image of a boy holding a mop and a bucket, looking slightly frustrated.
